title: The new animals are legit killing any enjoyment of the game
selftext:
Animals are fucking everywhere, I can't go 5 feet without having to change course because of a supercharged bear of pig heading straight for me, stealthy players are nigh impossible because you can't trail a target for more than half a grid without making a deer shit itself and run or having a bear lock onto you from 30 feet away and start chasing you which usually gets you killed

This update is absolutely fucking dreadful, first the completely uneccesary contact system then the roided up animals that nobody asked for
